content.en_US:
The heaviest fraction that is obtained from the [[oil refinery|Oil Refinery]] after processing [[crude oil|Crude Oil]] or [[desulfurized oil|Hydrotreating]]. It can also be obtained by [[pyrolyzing|Pyrolysis Oven]] coal with [[hydrogen|Liquid Hydrogen]]. It is further separated into [[bitumen|Bitumen]] and [[industrial oil|Industrial Oil]] using a [[fractioning tower|Fractioning Tower]].

It is also solidified into oil tar or converted into coal gasoline (powerful engine fuel) using a pyrolysis oven with coal.
